title: 这个插件报错，什么原因？
author: huwei5201314789
txt_content:
RT，抢红包插件
[03:57:09] [Server thread/WARN] [FML/]: =============================================================
[03:57:12] [Server thread/INFO] [org.jason.briberymoney.BriberyMoney/]: [BriberyMoney] Loading BriberyMoney v1.0
[03:57:12] [Server thread/WARN] [org.jason.briberymoney.BriberyMoney/]: [BriberyMoney] Could not save lang_zh.yml to plugins\BriberyMoney\lang_zh.yml because lang_zh.yml already exists.
[03:57:12] [Server thread/WARN] [org.jason.briberymoney.BriberyMoney/]: [BriberyMoney] Default system encoding may have misread config.yml from plugin jar
[03:57:12] [Server thread/ERROR] [org.jason.briberymoney.BriberyMoney/]: [BriberyMoney] Cannot load configuration from jar
org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException: unacceptable character '?' (0xFFFD) special characters are not allowed
in "<string>", position 50
        at org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration.loadFromString(YamlConfiguration.java:57) ~[YamlConfiguration.class:KCauldron-1.7.10-2.1403.1.54]

        at org.jason.briberymoney.BriberyMoney.onLoad(BriberyMoney.java:63) [【红包】BriberyMoney.jar:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.CraftServer.loadPlugins(CraftServer.java:325) [CraftServer.class:KCauldron-1.7.10-2.1403.1.54]

        at net.minecraft.world.storage.SaveHandler.func_75757_d(SaveHandler.java:137) [ayq.class:?]

        at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.<init>(WorldServer.java:153) [mt.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71247_a(MinecraftServer.java:356) [MinecraftServer.class:?]

        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_91]
Caused by: org.yaml.snakeyaml.reader.ReaderException: special characters are not allowed
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.reader.StreamReader.checkPrintable(StreamReader.java:70) ~[StreamReader.class:?]
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.reader.StreamReader.<init>(StreamReader.java:50) ~[StreamReader.class:?]

        ... 12 more复制代码这个报错，是每次启动服务器的时候刷出来。但是不影响使用，，
以及，游戏内，OP红包发出去了，其他普通玩家也能抢，但是发出去红包的时候，发送人老提示“缺少权限”但是红包却发出去了
领取人也是一样，缺少权限，但却依旧领取了。。。服务器也没报错，

replies.author: kitchenmm
replies.txt_content: 没把语言文件和config文件转码成UTF8无BOM格式，请自行转码

replies.author: huwei5201314789
replies.txt_content:
kitchenmm 发表于 2016-8-12 08:44
没把语言文件和config文件转码成UTF8无BOM格式，请自行转码

replies.author: kitchenmm
replies.txt_content:
kitchenmm 发表于 2016-8-12 08:44
没把语言文件和config文件转码成UTF8无BOM格式，请自行转码
但是报错里面的0xFFD就是明显的编码错误

replies.author: huwei5201314789
replies.txt_content:
Innovators 发表于 2016-8-12 09:29
编码的问题 Window转Ansi
已经是了，但还是依旧时不时报错，有时启动服务器的时候不会报错，有时候又会。。。
